s: With three 100-year brands, MITSUYA, Wilkinson, and CALPIS®, we know the value of making connections across 100 years, and we value activities that connect “excitement and smiles” to future generations. Our role as a company is to create a society full of smiles through our products.
Asahi Soft Drinks is one of the main operating companies of Asahi Group Holdings and is a pioneer in the beverage business with many traditional brands, including MITSUYA CIDER(R) and CALPIS(R).

Established in Japan in 1889, the Group has always been committed to innovation and quality. This dedication has brought together iconic brands and the expertise of renowned breweries from around the world, including those with a rich heritage spanning over centuries.

s: Asahi Soft Drinks is a soft and cool drinks manufacturing company.

Key products and brands include Asahi Super Dry, one of Japan’s best-known and most popular beer brands, as well as ready-to-drink beverages, whisky, wine and spirits, including shochu and sake. In addition, the group produces canned coffee, tea-based beverages and carbonated soft drinks.
